#Text= Lo says : " All your Dai Li agents ... " Li says : " And the Imperial Firebenders ?

column1: #Text=" Azula says : " None of them could be trusted .
#Text=Sooner or later , they all would have betrayed me .
#Text=Just like Mai and Ty Lee did .
#Text=" Lo and Li says : " Azula , we are concerned for you and your well - being .
#Text=" Azula says : " My father asked you to come here and talk to me , did n't he ?
#Text=He thinks I ca n't handle the responsibility of being Fire Lord .
#Text=But I will be the greatest leader in Fire Nation history .
#Text=" Lo says : " I 'm sure you will .
#Text=But considering everything that has happened today ... " Li says : " Perhaps it 's best if you postponed your coronation .
#Text=" Azula says : " What ?
#Text=Which one of you just said that ?
#Text=" Azula says : " What a shame ... there 's only one way to resolve this .
#Text=You two must duel each other .
#Text=I order you to fight an Agni Kai !
#Text=" Lo says : " But ... " Lo and Li says : " We 're not firebenders .
#Text=" Azula says : " All right , fine .
#Text=Lo , you 're banished .
#Text=Li , you can stay .
#Text=" Li says : " But , I 'm Li .
#Text=So who 's banished ?
#Text="
